skills.name: Oversized Main Battery (规格外の主炮)
skills.text:
1. Can fire [Main Battery] at Long Range.
2. Increase damage by 20%.

skills.name: Wrath (激怒)
skills.text:
1. When in any damaged state, all offensive capabilities stay fully operational.
2. If in a T-Advantage Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 50%
Else, if in a Parallel or Head-on Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 25%

skills.name: Artillery Support (强袭支援)
skills.text:
1.During battle when entering Medium Range from Long Range, cue Guadalcanal immediately deals 225% of her Firepower in damage against enemy with the highest HP.
Can only proc 2 times per battle.
